name: Birds of a Feather (chinchou2004)
description:
This game demo was created for a game jam hosted by Cloudzchow!

You follow a boy, named Erold Smith, who was kidnapped and forced to participate in a hunt where he is the prey!  Soon he faces trials in order to escape the forest in which he is a prisoner.  Is he going to make it out alive or would he end up dead by the hunters that are after him?

Music Credits: Meydan,  John Bartmann, Lobo Loco, Daniel Birch, Robert John, and Snakecharm!

Plugin Credits: Yanfly and Galv's
